attributes.action: Let urgent surgeries take place during these circumstances
attributes.additional_details: Loosing internal organs as young person is extremely worst case scenario, but can happen, if left and not sorted out - Surgery can prevent all of this. In some parts of the country you can have surgery and they have started up again. If this is the case, this should include all of the UK.
attributes.background: While the country is going through restrictions and covid related living, let people living with illnesses that effect their quality of life, get the surgery they need. There are certain illnesses if left and don’t have surgery, they could loose vital organs.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Surgery is able to take place, but decisions on who and what is treated is a matter for individual NHS trusts.
